name: DangerVersed (Open-Beta)
description:
Many dangerous curses are spreading throughout the world of MYTHOS and it is up to you to lift them and prevent an impending doom!


DangerVersed is a Bullet Hell Platformer with a big emphasis on Positioning, akin to Classic NES Games. You march through gauntlets of obstacles and parry projectiles; the direction you face is a key factor in overcoming obstacles!

This Demo Includes:

  • 4 Levels.
  • 7 Cutscenes.
  • 5 Playable Characters
  • and 8 Achievements.
